channel.title: How do i make a jad in a place that gives 100% drop firecape
channel.description: how can i put like 5 jads aroun the same area and make it when u kill one auto drops fire cape, and put like a 5 second respawn time? omeone please help .

item.title: How do i make a jad in a place that gives 100% drop firecape
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

For Respawn time, go in npc.cfg, and change this:

npc = 2745	TzTok-Jad			702	hp	respawntime

Example:

npc = 2745	TzTok-Jad			702	10000	5

Which means Jad has 10,000 Hitpoints and a Respawn time of 5 seconds.
[hr]

Fire Cape Drop in npcdrops.cfg

npcdrop = 2745	6570	1	100	//Tztok_Jad

Which means jad will drop Fire Cape Everytime 100%
[hr]

For the 5 Jads, go in autospawn.cfg

spawn = 2745 xcoord ycoord 0 ycoord xcoord xcoord ycoord 2 Tztok Jad spawn = 2745 xcoord ycoord 0 ycoord xcoord xcoord ycoord 2 Tztok Jad spawn = 2745 xcoord ycoord 0 ycoord xcoord xcoord ycoord 2 Tztok Jad spawn = 2745 xcoord ycoord 0 ycoord xcoord xcoord ycoord 2 Tztok Jad spawn = 2745 xcoord ycoord 0 ycoord xcoord xcoord ycoord 2 Tztok Jad

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a jad in a place that gives 100% drop firecape
